steps.title: Master menu
steps.content: The master menu gives you an overview of your players or important characters and gives you access to functions that are only intended for the master. (Default Hotkey M)

steps.title: Breeding pit
steps.content: The breeding pit allows you to create random characters, treasures or the like.

steps.title: Scene settings
steps.content: The scene settings allow quick access to settings such as darkness or the options for automatic light and vision configuration.

steps.title: All players (drag & drop)
steps.content: Here you can drag and drop all tracked actors onto the map at once.

steps.title: Random victim
steps.content: If you need a player for a random event, you can roll one here.

steps.title: Master check
steps.content: You can also make face-down rolls with the respective player characters.

steps.title: Player fate points
steps.content: Player fate points can also be overviewed and managed here.

steps.title: Other functions
steps.content: The master menu offers many more functions. For example, you can add more players, sort them, give them money or adventure points, show special properties, etc....
